name: Aglaonema
description: A low-maintenance, shade-tolerant plant with striking variegated leaves, perfect for brightening up low-light corners.

name: Alocasia Black Velvet
description: A dramatic houseplant with deep, velvety black leaves and striking white veins, adding a touch of exotic elegance to any space.

name: Anthurium
description: A tropical stunner with vibrant, heart-shaped blooms and glossy leaves, adding a touch of exotic elegance to any indoor space.

name: Areca Palm
description: A graceful, air-purifying palm with feathery fronds, bringing a tropical vibe and clean air to your space..

name: Cactus
description: A low-maintenance succulent with spiky armor and diverse shapes, perfect for adding a touch of the desert to your home.

name: Jade Plant
description: A resilient succulent with thick, glossy leaves, known for its good luck charm reputation and easy-going nature.

name: Jasmine
description: A fragrant vine with delicate white flowers, known for its intoxicating scent and ability to create a romantic and serene atmosphere.

name: Monstera
description: A trendy tropical plant with iconic split leaves, adding a bold and exotic statement to any modern interior.

name: Orchid
description: A delicate and exotic beauty with a wide range of vibrant colors and intricate shapes, symbolizing luxury and elegance.

name: Peace Lily
description: A graceful and air-purifying plant with elegant white blooms and glossy green leaves, adding a touch of peace and tranquility to your space.

name: Snake Plant
description: A tough and resilient plant with upright, sword-like leaves, known for its air-purifying qualities and ability to thrive in low-light conditions.

name: Spider Plant
description: A resilient and easy-going plant with arching leaves and adorable baby plantlets, perfect for adding a touch of greenery and life to any space.

name: Umbrella Plant
description: A tropical-looking houseplant with clusters of oval leaves radiating from a central stem, resembling an open umbrella, bringing a touch of the exotic to your space.
